credit_line: Museum purchase, Karl E. Weston Memorial Fund
title: Adire eleko wrapper
description: dark and light blue; hand painted, indigo resist-dye on pieced together cotton shirting. Originally purchased by Williams student in city of Ibadan, Nigeria 1984.
inscriptions: on verso, on hem near patch: [star w/ 8 rays ending in "feet"; on verso, opposite hem; {star, part folded onto recto]
